analysis.description:
Erc20TokensContract (/unique_chucks/34/0x24a57f642948e36e8f0ce0a4b3b940cbfe14bd4c.sol#7-14) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/34/0x24a57f642948e36e8f0ce0a4b3b940cbfe14bd4c.sol#8-9)

ICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0x24a57f642948e36e8f0ce0a4b3b940cbfe14bd4c.sol#149-189) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- currentBalance == erc20TokensContract.balanceOf(this)

Reentrancy in ICO.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0x24a57f642948e36e8f0ce0a4b3b940cbfe14bd4c.sol#149-189):
	External calls:
	- currentBalance = erc20TokensContract.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/34/0x24a57f642948e36e8f0ce0a4b3b940cbfe14bd4c.sol#170-171)
	- erc20TokensContract.transfer(msg.sender,_quantity) (/unique_chucks/34/0x24a57f642948e36e8f0ce0a4b3b940cbfe14bd4c.sol#173-176)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- deals (/unique_chucks/34/0x24a57f642948e36e8f0ce0a4b3b940cbfe14bd4c.sol#181-185)
	- dealsNumber (/unique_chucks/34/0x24a57f642948e36e8f0ce0a4b3b940cbfe14bd4c.sol#180)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/34/0x24a57f642948e36e8f0ce0a4b3b940cbfe14bd4c.sol#54-55:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
